titleInfo.title: May You Never Be Alone - Wilburn Brothers performance ; Cousin Nimrod and the Duck comedy routine

mods.abstract: Performance of May You Never Be Alone, written by Hank Williams, and performed by the Wilburn Brothers. Performance of a comedy routine by Cousin Nimrod and the Duck (Johnnie Wright and Ray Atkins).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
